segments.text: I see the water pouring out of the sink, and it’s making me feel a little sick.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying a plate like nothing’s wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is going to be ruined if this keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the children are going to slip and fall if they’re not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a wobbly stool, and it’s making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for a cookie, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why the woman hasn’t turned off the faucet yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just a mess, and it’s making me uncomfortable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone needs to clean this up before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is dripping down the cabinets, and it’s just gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around and sees what’s happening soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
